definition: corruption and abuse of the law (idiom); to take bribes and bend the law
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: We should try to clear graft, waste and inefficiency out of government.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該盡力消除政府中的貪贓枉法。

sentences.english: It is hoped that the new laws will scotch the snake of dishonesty among members of the government.
sentences.chinese: 大家希望新法律能打擊政府人員貪贓枉法。
